form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to convey to the Florida Department of Veterans Affairs all right, title, and interest of the United States to the property known as The Community Living Center at the Lake Baldwin Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic, Orlando, Florida.

section.header: Department of Veterans Affairs land conveyance, Lake Baldwin Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic, Orlando, Florida

subsection.text: The Secretary of Veterans Affairs may convey to the Florida Department of Veterans Affairs all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the property known as The Community Living Center, including any improvements thereon, which is part of the Lake Baldwin Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic, Orlando, Florida, located at 5201 Raymond Street, Orlando, Florida.
The conveyance under subsection (a) shall be subject to the following conditions:

paragraph.text: The recipient shall agree to accept the conveyed real property in its condition at the time of the conveyance.

The recipient shall agree not to apply the small house design model of the Department of Veterans Affairs Office of Construction and Facilities Management Design Guide for Community Living Centers to the conveyed real property.

subsection.text: The exact acreage and legal description of the parcels of real property conveyed under subsection (a) shall be determined by surveys satisfactory to the Secretary.

The Secretary may require such additional terms and conditions in connection with the conveyances under subsection (a) as the Secretary considers appropriate to protect the interests of the United States.
